main event: A visual sighting of a bright, white light at high altitude that maneuvered in a lateral direction and then disappeared.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright, white light.
The object maneuvered in a lateral direction before disappearing.
The sighting occurred in Yokota, Japan at coordinates 35.40째N 139.06째E.
The report states that the sighting appears to be characteristic of a meteor.
